title: Authors and Citation
text: André Veríssimo (2023). shiny.molstar: R Shiny wrapper Mol* (/'molstar/) - visualization toolkit large-scale molecular data. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {shiny.molstar: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data},   author = {{André Veríssimo}},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

what: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
title: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
text: R Shiny wrapper Mol* (/’molstar/) - visualization toolkit large-scale molecular data Based Mol* (/’molstar/) powered shiny.react created R Shiny wrapper based shiny.react molstar-react (node.js library) gives powerful tools Mol* open-source toolkit visualization analysis large-scale molecular data. package exports three new components can used Shiny application. Molstar creates Molstar visualization protein using URL valid filetype supported Molstar “Protein Data Bank” id (pdbId). See available databases find valid pdbId. AlphaFoldMolstar similar Molstar component, uses UniProt id AlphaFold database display protein. AlphaFoldDetails creates component retrieves details AlphaFold protein id (title, download links Predict Aligned Error image)

what: How to find a valid id or url?
title: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
text: valid pdbId can found public databases : EMBL-EBI database RSCB.org uniProtId can found AlphaFold databases: AlphaFold.com

title: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
text: install package, run: Take look basic example app start working shiny.molstar. learn Mol* language, follow Viewer documentation.

title: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
text: good way learn look examples. install library, can run shiny.molstar::runExample function.

title: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
text: Creating full page viewer sample molecule (example also available inst/examples/FullPage.R) Full page example
code: library(shiny) library(shiny.molstar)  shinyApp(   ui = tagList(     tags$style(HTML("html, body { margin: 0; }")),     Molstar(       pdbId = "1LOL",       useInterface = TRUE,       showControls = TRUE,       showAxis = TRUE     )   ),   server = function(input, output) {   } )

title: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* (/'molstar/) - A visualization toolkit of large-scale molecular data
text: Running example package (located inst/examples/AlphaFoldDetails.R). can click button bottom example get minimal code reproduce Shiny application (unstyled without footer). AlphaFold details

title: AlphaFoldDetails shiny element — AlphaFoldDetails
text: AlphaFoldDetails shiny element

title: AlphaFoldDetails shiny element — AlphaFoldDetails
code: AlphaFoldDetails(   class = NULL,   uniProtId = NULL,   showFiles = FALSE,   showPae = FALSE,   ... )

title: AlphaFoldDetails shiny element — AlphaFoldDetails
text: class character string class name apply outer parent element. uniProtId character string containing UniProt id AlphaFold database. showFiles logical value indicating download links files database shown div. showPae logical value indicating predicted aligned error image shown. ... Component props children.

title: AlphaFoldDetails shiny element — AlphaFoldDetails
code:
AlphaFoldDetails(uniProtId = "A0A1U8FD60", showPae = TRUE, showFiles = TRUE) #>
#> #> #>

title: AlphaFoldMolstar shiny element — AlphaFoldMolstar
text: AlphaFoldMolstar shiny element

title: AlphaFoldMolstar shiny element — AlphaFoldMolstar
code: AlphaFoldMolstar(   class = NULL,   uniProtId = NULL,   dimensions = NULL,   useInterface = FALSE,   showControls = FALSE,   showAxes = FALSE,   useCif = FALSE,   ... )

title: AlphaFoldMolstar shiny element — AlphaFoldMolstar
text: class character string class name apply outer parent element. uniProtId character string containing UniProt id AlphaFold database. dimensions integer vector indicating dimensions visualization pixels (c(width, height)). default molstar plugin take full screen. useInterface logical value indicating full Molstar interface used around core canvas. showControls logical value indicating controls shown around sides interface. needs useInterface parameter also TRUE. recommended large sizes. showAxes logical value indicating axes appear bottom left corner. useCif logical value indicating CIF file used instead PDB (retrieved Alpha Fold's database). ... Component props children.

title: AlphaFoldMolstar shiny element — AlphaFoldMolstar
code:
AlphaFoldMolstar(uniProtId = "A0A1U8FD60", dimensions = c(300, 300)) #>
#> #> #>
AlphaFoldMolstar(uniProtId = "A0A1U8FD60", useInterface = TRUE) #>
#> #> #>

title: Molstar shiny element — Molstar
text: Shiny.react component show Molstar molecular visualizations. can use "Protein Data Bank" id, URL valid .pdb/.cif file internet.

title: Molstar shiny element — Molstar
code: Molstar(   class = NULL,   url = NULL,   pdbId = NULL,   dimensions = NULL,   useInterface = FALSE,   showControls = FALSE,   showAxes = FALSE,   ... )

title: Molstar shiny element — Molstar
text: class character string class name apply outer parent element. url Load structure passing URL file. file type needs supported Molstar (.pdb, .cif). pdbId Load official PDB structure supplying 4 letter ID. See details example databses. dimensions integer vector indicating dimensions visualization pixels (c(width, height)). default molstar plugin take full screen. useInterface logical value indicating full Molstar interface used around core canvas. showControls logical value indicating controls shown around sides interface. needs useInterface parameter also TRUE. recommended large sizes. showAxes logical value indicating axes appear bottom left corner. ... Component props children.

title: Molstar shiny element — Molstar
text: pdbId can found public databases : https://www.ebi.ac.uk/pdbe/entry/search/index/ https://www.rcsb.org/ file parameter supported react library, used Shiny.

title: Molstar shiny element — Molstar
code:
Molstar(pdbId = "1LOL", dimensions = c(300, 300)) #>
#> #> #>
Molstar(pdbId = "1y98", dimensions = c(300, 300)) #>
#> #> #>
url <- "https://alphafold.ebi.ac.uk/files/AF-A0A1U8FD60-F1-model_v4.pdb" Molstar(url = url, dimensions = c(300, 300)) #>
#> #> #>
url2 <- "https://alphafold.ebi.ac.uk/files/AF-A0A1U8FD60-F1-model_v4.cif" Molstar(url = url2, dimensions = c(300, 300)) #>
#> #> #>
